languages.text: "Пока ты думаешь над ответом, Эдельтрад, я хочу поговорить кое с кем другим. Может быть, мне дадут ответ интереснее, чем невразумительное мычание". {n}Теодора кивает в вашу сторону.{/n} "Подойди".

traits.locale_text: "Пока ты думаешь над ответом, Эдельтрад, я хочу поговорить кое с кем другим. Может быть, мне дадут ответ интереснее, чем невразумительное мычание". {n}Теодора кивает в вашу сторону.{/n} "Подойди".

languages.text: "While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I wish to speak with someone else. Perhaps I shall hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."
languages.original_text: "Пока ты думаешь над ответом, Эдельтрад, я хочу поговорить кое с кем другим. Может быть, мне дадут ответ интереснее, чем невразумительное мычание". {n}Теодора кивает в вашу сторону.{/n} "Подойди".

traits.locale_text: "While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I want to speak with someone else. Perhaps I will hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."

"While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I want to speak with someone else. Perhaps I will hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."

"While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I wish to speak with someone else. Perhaps I shall hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."

"While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I wish to speak with someone else. Perhaps I shall hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."

"While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I wish to speak with someone else. Perhaps I shall hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."

languages.text: “在你考虑答案的这段时间，艾德萨德，我打算和其他人谈谈。说不定，我会听到比语无伦次的喃喃自语更有趣的内容。”{n}西奥多拉朝你的方向点了点头。{/n}“过来。”
languages.original_text: "While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I wish to speak with someone else. Perhaps I shall hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."

traits.locale_text: “在你考虑答案的这段时间，艾德萨德，我打算和其他人谈谈。说不定，我会听到比语无伦次的喃喃自语更有趣的内容。”{n}西奥多拉朝你的方向点了点头。{/n}“过来。”

languages.text: «Mientras meditas tu respuesta, Edelthrad, quiero hablar con otra persona. Tal vez tenga algo más que decir que murmullos incoherentes». {n}Theodora asiente hacia ti.{/n} «Acércate».
languages.original_text: "While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I wish to speak with someone else. Perhaps I shall hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras meditas tu respuesta, Edelthrad, quiero hablar con otra persona. Tal vez tenga algo más que decir que murmullos incoherentes». {n}Theodora asiente hacia ti.{/n} «Acércate».

languages.text: 「エデルスラド、答えを考えている間、私は他の者と話そうと思う。あなたの支離滅裂なつぶやきよりも、もっと興味深い何かを聞けるでしょう」{n}シオドーラは、あなたの方向にうなずいて言う。{/n}「来い」
languages.original_text: "While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I wish to speak with someone else. Perhaps I shall hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."

traits.locale_text: 「エデルスラド、あなたが答えを考えている間、私は他の誰かと話したいのですが。たぶん、支離滅裂なつぶやきよりももっと興味深い何かを聞けるでしょう」{n}テオドラはあなたの方向にうなずいて言う。{/n}「こちらへ」
「エデルスラド、答えを考えている間、私は他の者と話そうと思いる。あなたの支離滅裂なつぶやきよりも、もっと興味深い何かを聞けるでしょう」{n}シオドーラは、あなたの方向にうなずいて言う。{/n}「来い」

languages.text: « Pendant que vous réfléchissez à votre réponse, Edelthrad, j'aimerais m'entretenir avec quelqu'un d'autre. Qui sait, j'entendrai peut-être autre chose que des marmonnements ineptes. » {n}Théodora vous fait un signe de tête.{/n} « Approchez. »
languages.original_text: "While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I wish to speak with someone else. Perhaps I shall hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."

traits.locale_text: « Pendant que vous réfléchissez à votre réponse, Edelthrad, j'aimerais m'entretenir avec quelqu'un d'autre. Qui sait, j'entendrai peut-être autre chose que des marmonnements ineptes. » {n}Théodora vous fait un signe de tête.{/n} « Approchez. »

languages.text: "Während Ihr über Eure Antwort nachdenkt, Edelthrad, möchte ich mit jemand anderem sprechen. Vieleicht erwartet mich dort Interessanteres als unverständliches Gemurmel." {n}Theodora nickt in deine Richtung.{/n} "Tretet näher."
languages.original_text: "While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I wish to speak with someone else. Perhaps I shall hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."

traits.locale_text: "Während Ihr über Eure Antwort nachdenkt, Edelthrad, möchte ich mit jemand anderem sprechen. Vieleicht erwartet mich dort Interessanteres als unverständliches Gemurmel." {n}Theodora nickt in deine Richtung.{/n} "Tretet näher."

languages.text: "Sen cevabını düşünedur Edelthrad, ben de bir başkasıyla konuşayım. Belki anlamsız mırıltılardan daha ilginç şeyler der." {n}Theodora başıyla sana doğru işaret ediyor.{/n} "Yaklaş."
languages.original_text: "While you are considering your answer, Edelthrad, I wish to speak with someone else. Perhaps I shall hear something more interesting than incoherent mumbling." {n}Theodora nods in your direction.{/n} "Approach."
